name: Old Salt
description: The Old Salt is a Medium Undead creature, possessing a skeletal appearance reminiscent of a sailor, with tattered clothing and remnants of sailing paraphernalia.
memorable: Its ability to reduce maximum hit points with necrotic damage and revive after 13 days adds a level of urgency to encounters.
goals: To seek revenge against those who wronged it in life.
relations: Could be encountered with other undead sailors or maritime creatures.
environment: Typically found near coastal areas, docks, or aboard ships.
strengths: Immune to poison and resistant to necrotic damage, making it durable against common combat threats.
weaknesses: Cannot recover from certain conditions and depends on its unique mechanics for rejuvenation.
attacks: Multiattack with two Desiccating Slam melee attacks dealing bludgeoning and necrotic damage; a Wave of Seawater attack that can incapacitate.
most_powerful_ability: Seaside Rejuvenation allows it to regenerate and return if its name is not cleared within 13 days.
senses: Possesses darkvision, allowing it to see in dim light as if it were bright light within a 60-foot range.
skills: Proficient in perception, enabling it to detect hidden threats effectively.
additional_information: Advantage on Strength (Athletics) and Dexterity (Acrobatics) checks on a sailing ship.
Does not require air, food, drink, or sleep due to its undead nature.
Can choke opponents with its Wave of Seawater ability.
Deals persistent damage through its necrotic attacks.
Revival mechanism adds urgency to player decisions.
